table.caption: Table 242 — Flag for reset-form actions
head: Bit position
Name
Meaning
rows: If clear, the Fields array (see "Table 241 — Additional entries specific to a reset-form action") specifies which fields to reset. (All descendants of the specified fields in the field hierarchy are reset as well.) If set, the Fields array indicates which fields to exclude from resetting; that is, all fields in the document’s interactive form is reset except those listed in the Fields array.
